akn:subsection.akn:heading: Use of elements of Department of Defense

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Use of elements of Department of Defense The Secretary of Defense, in carrying out the functions described in this section, may use such elements of the Department of Defense as may be appropriate for the execution of those functions, in addition to, or in lieu of, the elements identified in this section.
